userdoc.notice: Represents the configuration required to deploy the periphery contracts. It is expected         to read the file from JSON. A future improvement would be to have fallback         values if they are not defined in the JSON themselves.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Warning: unable to read config. Do not deploy unless you are not using config."
